Comments_List: Overview of governing equations and major types of flows in atmosphere and oceans as well as scaling and instability analysis

Strengths:
detailed, rigorous

weaknesses:
no TA. Problem-sets should be divided into smaller sub-divisions so one can move through the questions step by step.

Mid term was too early in the course. I wish there would be more exam-related prep.
I would only recommend this course to a student who isn't afraid of really hard problem sets.
